messages.title: Mike backs cash boost for local services
messages.content: Local candidate Mike Crockart has backed a plan to invest an extra £800 million of funds in Edinburgh over 6 years.

messages.title: BURGLARY EPIDEMIC A RESULT OF SNP CUT TO LOCAL POLICING
messages.content: Local Lib Dems demand change to policing strategy and the closure of local police public counters.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment of an extra £800 million in Edinburgh for NHS and other local services over 6 years.
Demand change to police strategy, reopening of public counters, and increase in visibility of community policing.

housing.content: Time for the SNP to come clean on housing plans

quotes.text: The SNP could even sort out a one ticket one seat bus service!

images.caption: The Lib Dem plan for a stronger Scotland
